summary: MY AUTO OVER HEATS.  COOLANT LEAKS AROUND THE INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKETS NEAR THE HEAT SENSOR. I HAVE TO ADD COOLANT AT LEAST ONCE A WEEK. MY AUTO IS A 1999 CHEVROLET MALIBU FOUR DOOR SEDAN,VIN #[XXX]. I DIDN'T RECOGNIZE THIS PROBLEM FOR WHAT IT REALLY WAS UNTIL WARRANTY EXPIRED.  HIGH GAS CONSUMPTION. ONLY 71,000 MILES.  TOWN DRIVEN BY LADY.  DEALER SAYS THIS COMMON PROBLEM WITH CAR.   *NLM    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
